explanation: [0-0] Against a purple background, one hand holds an empty capsule packaging shell while the other holds scissors, ready to cut the capsule.

[0-4] The scissors then cut one side of the capsule shell. The scene switches to show the other side being cut, leaving an oval-shaped capsule shell. The background then changes to red as a hand uses scissors to trim the edges of the empty capsule. The scene switches again to show the capsule being opened into two halves. Afterward, the background turns blue, and tweezers hold a piece of pink clay while transparent glue is applied to it.
